DOC.brief_title: Semi-replicate Crossover Bioequivalence Study Dirithromycin ( Abdi İbrahim İlaç San . Ve Tic . A. Ş. , Turkey ) Healthy Subjects Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: An open-label , randomize , three -period , two-treatment , three -sequence , semi-replicate crossover bioequivalence study washout period least 14 day dos . Healthy , mixed skin Arab & Mediterranean Subjects age 18 50 year , body-mass index 18.5 30.0 kg/m2 inclusive ( minimum 50 kg weight ) , non-smokers light smoker ( smoker 10 cigarette per day ) .
